vijay-sethupathi-another-movie-announced.heading: Vijay Sethupathi's Another New Movie Announced
vijay-sethupathi-another-movie-announced.author: Balaji
textContent: Another New update has come for Vijay sethupathi movie. He has been on movie spree. His next upcoming movie has been named “Yaathum oore Yaavarum Kelir”. This movie has been directed by Venkata Krishna Roghanth . This movie has been produced by Chandaraa arts. Nivas K prasanna has penned music for this movie.
We are hearing that trailer will be releasing soon for this movie. Vijay sethupathy is riding on his success of his previous movie Ka pe Ranasingham
Vijay sethupathy was recently applauded for his role in Master. Also we have heard confirmed news that master will be remade in Hindi. Lead roles are not yet finalized
Subscribe to Cinema Period for more updates.

aari-has-won-tamilbigboss4.heading: Aari has won 4th Season Bigboss Tamil?
aari-has-won-tamilbigboss4.author: Akash
textContent: Big Boss has finally come to an end. We are hearing news that Aari has won the title for big boss Tamil 4th season. We are hearing that he has got huge votes ahead of other contestants
Unofficial Votes has got similar results.
This has not happened usually as usually numbers come close for all the contestants in previous seasons.
We hear that runner up will be Balaji, Rio, Som followed by Ramya

vijay-sethupathi-new-movie-announced.heading: Vijay Sethupathi's New Movie Announced
vijay-sethupathi-new-movie-announced.author: Balaji
textContent: In 1987, Kamal Haasan acted in a movie called Pesum Padam. It was a movie with no dialogues. Yes, a full-length feature film with no dialogues at all. It was one of the experiments of Kamal Haasan with director Singeetham Srinivasa Rao. It was released in several languages as the language was a non-issue with this movie.

After 34 years, actor Vijay Sethupathi is acting in another silent film. Coinciding his birthday today, the actor took to Twitter to announce this movie's announcement with a poster. The movie is interestingly titled 'Gandhi Talks'. This movie is to be directed by Kishor Pandurang Belekar. This movie will also have a pan India release. Actor Divay Dhamija is also a part of the movie.

Actor Vijay Sethupathi has become a bankable hero who experiments the most among all actors of this generation. Few times, his movies have back fired. But this actor keeps himself going through path breaking streak. It was evident in the recently released 'Master' as well.
Subscribe to Cinema Period for more updates.

indru-netru-naalai-2-movie-cast-announce.heading: Indru Netru Naalai-2 Movie Cast Announced
indru-netru-naalai-2-movie-cast-announce.author: Balaji
textContent: Five years ago, Indru Netru Naalai Movie was released. It was one of the biggest sleeper hits of the year 2016. It featured Vishnu Vishal and Mia George as lead actors and it has actor Karunakaran as the lead comedian. It was based on time travel and it worked extremely well among the youth and the families. It was one of the best movies with time travel concept and with its budget, it was highly successful. Actor Arya played a cameo in the movie.
It was produced under Thirukumaran Entertainments by CV Kumar and directed by Ram Kumar. Ram Kumar is currently finishing his Ayalaan movie with Siva karthikeyan. It also had music by hiphop Tamizha.
Now Indru Netru Nalai is going to have a sequel. This movie is also going to be produced by CV Kumar and he has announced that the entire movie's main cast has been retained for the sequel as well.
Let us hope the sequel is better or at least as good as the first part.

dhanush-naane-varuven-heroine.heading: Dhanush-Selva Raghavan Movie 'Naane Varuven' Heroine
dhanush-naane-varuven-heroine.author: Balaji
textContent: Director Selva Raghavan has been making waves after announcing his movie with his actor-brother Dhanush titled 'Aayirathil Oruvan 2'. It is the sequel to the first part featuring actor Karthi.

Before commencing 'Aayirathil Oruvan 2', the duo is making another movie titled 'Naane Varuven'. This is produced by producer Kaipuli S Thanu, music by Yuvan Shankar Raja. This movie has reportedly two heroines. And one of the heroines is reported to be actress Tamannah. A official announcement is awaited from the team.
Tamannah has already paired with actor Dhanush in movies like Padikadhavan and Vengai. The cinematographer is Arvind Krishna.
Let’s hope movie releases soon and meets audience expectations.

KGF2-movie-teaser-launched.heading: KGF2 Movie Teaser Launched
KGF2-movie-teaser-launched.author: Akash
textContent: KGF2 is from sequel from massive HIT KGF. KGF is biggest HIT movie in Kannada language. Movie is a period based one. Movie stars Yash as lead role. Movie has huge expectation from fans
Movie has got huge fan base similar to Bahubali series. Movie gets released as PAN Indian movie.
KGF2 teaser has received huge response from audience and cinematography has been top notch.
Let’s hope movie releases soon and meets audience expectations.

Rocky-movie-teaser-launched.heading: Rocky Tamil Movie Teaser Launched
Rocky-movie-teaser-launched.author: Akash
textContent: Rocky is Tamil movie starring Vasanth Ravi and Bharathi Raja. Rocky teaser has been released and it has been most intense teaser released in Tamil.
Movie is directed by Arun Matheswaran who is AD of Thiyagaraja kumar raja . Darbuka Siva has penned music for this film.
Vasanth Ravi earlier did debut in Taramani movie. Few fans has expressed displeasure for teaser being very much intense
Movie has been produced by Rowdy pictures owned by Nayanthara and Vignesh Shivan

Dhanush43-movie-shootcommences.heading: Dhanush43 Shoot commences
Dhanush43-movie-shootcommences.author: Akash
textContent: Dhanush 43 movie shoot has commenced today. Movie has been directed by Karthick Naren.
Karthick Naren previous movie Mafia was not received well by the audience. He keeps his hope high on this movie.
Move stares Dhanush, Malavika mohan , Samuthirakani and Smruthi Venkat .
Opening track has been sung by dhanush, written by Lyricist Vivek and music is done by GV Prakash .Lyricist Vivek has also been roped recently as additional screen play writer for this movie.

vetrimaaran-soori-movie-shootcommences.heading: Vetrimaaran Soori Movie Shoot commences
vetrimaaran-soori-movie-shootcommences.author: Akash
textContent: National Film award-winning Filmmaker Vetrimaaran is currently working on this movie along with Actor Sorri. Soori will pen lead role. Movie is produced by Elred Kumar RS Infotainment.
Vijay sethupathi was about to act with Vetrimaaran in Vadachennai and it got missed due to Date issues. It will be interesting to see Vijay sethupathy working under Ace director
Sorri is debuting as lead in a biggie for first time. Soori’s comedies haven’t clicked big time in his recent movies. This might have been a reason for him to put hopes high on Vetrimaaran’

Shoot for this movie has commenced very quicky. Vijay sethupathi is acting in a old person role . He has done it earlier in Orange mittai and Seethakathi .We also understand look test was completed earlier this week in a Star hotel in chennai for Vijaysethupathi

has-aari-utilised-bigboss-to-fullest.heading: Is aari the only contestant who really understood the Bigboss Game?
has-aari-utilised-bigboss-to-fullest.author: Akash
textContent: Is aari the only contestant who really understood the game?

It really seems that Aari has really captured huge audience. Almost every unofficial big boss vote proves that. Also he is the contestant who gets saved first every week despite getting nominated by fellow team mates. His name gets trended in twitter often

Aari has been calm despite all team mates group and play against him. He stays very calm and points others mistake correctly. This has got him audience in both sides. Some like him loads and admire him. Some feel he is being very negative and toxic. His fights with bala promo were trending on YouTube on first position for long time.
Aari’s career span of 10 years wasn’t very much successful. He is known for his role in Nedunchalai movie.  He is using Bigboss stage to utilize fully for his career growth.
His critics argue that he has paid bots and his entire fan base is created by bots.

He has two movie’s trailer and motion poster launched when he was in big boss house and both movies created huge waves. ‘Aleka’ and ‘Bagavan’. Aleka movie trailer garnered 1.5 M views and Bhagavan motion poster is nearing 1M views.
So for we have not witnessed big boss contestants shining big after leaving big boss house show. We were able to notice Raiza Wilson and Harish Kalyan getting decent success

has-ramya-utilised-bigboss-to-fullest.heading: Is Big boss really helping its participants or leading to their FALL
has-ramya-utilised-bigboss-to-fullest.author: Akash
textContent: Actress Ramya had huge fans before bigg boss. It was due to the popular motta maadi Photoshoot and her performance in Cook with comali show in Vijay TV.  Her performance was received well in JOKER movie directed by Rajumurugan.
Bigboss show has got her negative name. She has got her a name as Nari pandiyan due to her soft hurt nature.
Usually big boss was said as a show where people will get a huge fame. It is happening in reverse also.

Other Contestants who faced similar problems was VJ Archana, RJ Suchi and Comedian Nisha. They had huge popular name and fans. But due to their performance in Big boss they have got so much trolls and the show hasn’t helped them. ’
Let’s wait and watch how they are going to take up the career in future.
So for we have not witnessed big boss contestants shining big after leaving big boss house show. We were able to notice Raiza Wilson and Harish Kalyan getting decent success

actor-vijay-sethupathi-joins-vetrimaaran.heading: Actor Vijay sethupathi joins Vetrimaaran Soori Movie
actor-vijay-sethupathi-joins-vetrimaaran.author: Balaji
textContent: National Film award-winning Filmmaker Vetrimaaran is currently working on this movie along with Actor Sorri. Soori will pen lead role. Movie is produced by Elred Kumar RS Infotainment.

Director Bharathiraja was supposed to act in one important role. Due to health reasons he was not able to join the team. This interesting role went to Vetrimaran’s favourite Kishore and later it has reached hands of Vijay sethupathi
Vijay sethupathi was about to act with Vetrimaaran in Vadachennai and it got missed due to Date issues. It will be interesting to see Vijay sethupathy working under Ace director
Sorri is debuting as lead in a biggie for first time. Soori’s comedies haven’t clicked big time in his recent movies. This might have been a reason for him to put hopes high on Vetrimaaran’
Vetrimaaran is expected to finish Sorri’s movie soon and expected to join Vaadivasal led by Actor Soorya . Let’s wait and watch how this movie turns up.

actor-arvindswami-comment-on-100-percent.heading: Actor Aravind Swami Comments on 100% Theatre Occupancy Allowance
actor-arvindswami-comment-on-100-percent.author: Balaji
textContent: Recently the Tamil Nadu Government, as per the requests from the cinema industry, allowed for 100% theatre occupancy. The cinema theatre industry unanimously welcomed this move. Many industry peopler have also thanked the Government, especially TN Chief Minister Palanisami and Kadambur Raju.

But the vacinnation process is yet to be actively started in India, and the new strain cases increasing slowly, actor Arvind Swami has commented on Twitter that 50% occupancy would have been better than the 100% allowance.

This Pongal, two important releases, Eeswaran and Master are waiting in line for the theatres to become a fanfare. The actor has pointed out that the scare and threat from the virus is still at large.This was welcomed by few and debated by a few. This tweet was also critized by other stars' fans too.
Actor Arvind Swami has completed shooting for 'Thalaivi' movie. He is playing the iconic MGR in the movie.
Now the actor has let out his opinion. What do you think about this 100% occupancy allowance move by the Government?

ponniyin-selvan-movie-shooting-resumes.heading: Ponniyin Selvan Movie Shooting Resumes
ponniyin-selvan-movie-shooting-resumes.author: Balaji
textContent: Many actors are being blamed for charging exobirant fees without valuing their project's return and their box office status. But if there is a person for which every actor are ready to come and act for lesser pay, it has to be director Mani Ratnam. He commands respect from the industry folks like no one else. His movies' box office performance might not shatter records, but all actors would love to be a part of his movies.

He is currently directing magnum opus 'Ponniyin Selvan'. It has a great lineup of actors, probably one of the greatest in last few decades. Amitabh Bachan, Aishwarya Rai, Mohan Babu, Vikram, Karthi, Jayam Ravi, Trisha, Keerthy Suresh are all part of this two part movie. Part 1 is expected to release around June 2021. The music is by AR Rahman, cinematography by Ravi Varman, art by Thotta Tharani and dialogues by Jayamohan.

The movie's shooting is to resume tomorrow (Jan 6th 2021) in Hyderabad. All the crew members that are part of the shooting schedule have undergone Corona tests. Dance master Brindha is choreograhing a dance spetacle for a song. This movie is produced jointly by Madras Talkies and Lyca Productions.
Let us witness the story of the Chola kingdom as a celebration in Tamil Cinema as soon as the movie sees the light of the day. Watch this space for more updates.

indian2-movie-dropped.heading: Is Indian2 Movie Getting Dropped?
indian2-movie-dropped.author: Aravindh
textContent: Indian2 is a long awaited movie from actor Kamal hasan . There is no news from production house lyca regarding commencing shooting for the movie. This has created a news like movie is about to get dropped. Kamal haasan has been currently busy shooting big boss and Lokesh Kanagaraj directed Vikraam. He is also held up in his political party canvassing for assembly elections.

Indian 2 is a political thriller movie which is sequel movie of Indian which released on 1996. This movie also features Siddharth, Kajal Aggarwal, Rakul Preet Singh, Priya Bhavani Shankar and Vivekh in important roles
There has been news like Director Shankar is not happy with production house due to delay and focusing about his upcoming projects. Movie shoot has been already completed 50 %.
Movie shoot earlier got halted due to a serious accident in the sets. 3 technicians lost their lives and few of them were seriously injured.

Post lockdown release, almost every movie shoot got commenced, sadly there is no news about Indian 2 movie. Another possiblity for Indian2 is production company getting changed from LYCA . It will be very difficult to drop this movie as budget more than 100 crore has been invested

tv-personality-pugazh-part-of-valimai-mo.heading: Popular TV Personality Pugazh Is Part Of 'Valimai' Movie
tv-personality-pugazh-part-of-valimai-mo.author: Balaji
textContent: TV perosanality Pugazh is very popular among the Tamil audience from his popular TV shows. He is best known for his association with Vijay TV, especially in 'Cook with Comali' show. His antics and comedic punchlines are popular among the young crowd.

Now it has been unofficially revealed that he is a part of actor Ajith's current movie Valimai. He has already shot for his portions in the movie. As this revelation became public, it started to spread wildly in social media.

Actor Ajith avoids any public events for past many years. As his fans don't have access to the actor's public life, any update regarding him or his movies are highly anticipated by his fans all the time. It never stops. Few fans had made flex posters with producer Boney on it and slogans asking for 'movie updates'. It grabbed few eyeballs for the innnovativeness and also for wasting money and time for frivolous efforts.

Valimai's shooting is underway in Hyderabad and the team is planning to shoot in Delhi next, which was earlier planned to be shot in Malaysia or Sweden. Due to the Corona pandemic situation, the team has zeroed in Delhi as the final shoot location. The movie is touted to be released on May 1st this year, coinciding with the actor's birthday.
Valimai is directed by H Vinoth, has music by Yuvan Shankar Raja and produced by Boney Kapoor, under BayView LLC. The movie also features Huma Qureshi as lead actress.

We have usually seen that movies in Amazon prime not being successful except soorarai Potru. It will be interesting to see how this movie turns out. It is understood that Maara will be releasing in Tamil, Telugu and Malayalam . Click on below link to enjoy watching this trailer

theatres-adopts-new-strategy.heading: Theatres adopts new strategy
theatres-adopts-new-strategy.author: Akash
textContent: Theatres are failing to attract crowd post lockdown release. There is hardly any crowd for new release movies. Several theatres outside Chennai has decided to shut down due to loss and planned to open when Master movie releases.
Only two movies’ fetched decent crowd. Both were Hollywood most expected movies. TENET and Wonder Woman had decent footfalls.
Theatres decided to play old HIT movies in premastered versions. Surprisingly those movies collected got returns than expected.

So far Ayirathil oruvan and Puthupettai were released and got decent footfalls. We are hearing that so many movies are going to get released in coming days. Anbe sivam , Billa (Actor Ajith version) and Avvai shanmugi are in the cards to get released soon .
Let’s hope that these movies help theatres to run in profit. Theatre business is most HIT post COVID 19 situation

eswaran-movie-director-suseenthiran-cont.heading: Eswaran Movie Director Suseenthiran Lands In Controversy
eswaran-movie-director-suseenthiran-cont.author: Akash
textContent: Eeswaran aka Eswaran's movie director Suseenthiran has stuck with a controversy. Eeswaran audio launch recently happened in Albert theatre Chennai. We noticed movie crew present in theatre. The cast of Eeswaran includes Silambarasan and Nidhhi Agerwal in lead roles. Director turned actor Bharathiraja has penned an important role

During audio launch of the movie Actress Nidhhi Agerwal was giving her speech. Suseenthiran kind of forced her to call as mama from stage. The way he made her call wasn’t taken positively by netizens. There were so many backlashes against Suseenthiran.

Suseenthiran got into a controversy earlier stating that ‘Actor Ajith has to become next CM’. In relation to Eeswaran movie controversy, director Suseenthiran has given a clarification for his statement in stage
He has mentioned that Actress Nidhhi Agerwal was told to call in a way how she calls him in movie. He has mentioned he dint do it in wrong way.
With a controversy around Suseenthiran, he has stuck with gold by getting a chance to direct Silambarasan for another movie. Actor Silambarasan has announced this news on Eeswaran audio launch.

actor-madhavan-maara-movie-trailer-relea.heading: Actor Madhavan's New Movie 'Maara' Trailer Launched
actor-madhavan-maara-movie-trailer-relea.author: Akki
textContent: Maara is a Tamil movie directed by Dhilip Kumar and features R. Madhavan, Shraddha Srinath, Padmavati Rao and Alexander Babu as lead characters. This movie also features Joker fame Guru Somasundaram
This movie is adaptation of Malayalam Blockbuster movie Charlie featuring Dulquer Salman. It was a HIT movie in mollywood and explores beautiful life of Traveller.
This movie has been in production for long time due to casting issues. Initially Sai pallavi was roped for lead role. Later she was replaced by Shraddha srinath

Madhavan has been rejecting multiple roles as he is busy producing and acting in 'Rocketry: The Nambi Effect' based on the life of Nambi Narayanan, a former scientist of ISRO . His previous outing with Nishabhdam didnt go well.

We have usually seen remakes not being successful in Tamil cinema. Particularly Malayalam remake movies. We have seen movies like Banglore days, Nimir not being HIT in tamil. This is due to the difference in culture between both states

It will be very interesting to see if this movie will be HIT or not. We will know this on January 8th as this movie releases on Amazon Prime. Strangely his previous movie Nishabhdam was also released on Amazon prime

We have usually seen that movies in Amazon prime not being successful except soorarai Potru. It will be interesting to see how this movie turns out. It is understood that Maara will be releasing in Tamil, Telugu and Malayalam . Click on below link to enjoy watching this trailer

new-tele-serial-sillunu-oru-kadhal-in-co.heading: New Tele Serial 'Sillunu Oru Kadhal' in Colors Tamil
new-tele-serial-sillunu-oru-kadhal-in-co.author: Balaji
textContent: With the new age web series, short films, web film, live movies and virtual standups making waves throughout the world, the one thing that stands out as evergreen is a Television Serial. A new Tamil Television serial titled 'Sillunu Oru Kadhal' is getting started from 4th Jan 2021 in Colors Tamil channel.

The title pretty much gives it away what we can expect in the serial. The teaser of the serial was launched in Youtube. The teaser shows the chemistry between the lead actors. A IPS officer played by Sameer Ahamuthu and a young woman played by Darshini.

There is also a contest for the audience to participate and win gold coins. The viewers have to answer to the questions asked pertaining to everyday's episode. Everyday 5 winners are to be chosen from all the correct entries. Each winner will get a gold coin worth Rs.3000. You can send your answers via Whatsapp to +91-6380661339 in the format 'Question No (1 or 2 or 3 or 4)>SPACE <Option (A, B, C or D)<SPACE> NAME<Space>AGE<SPACE>TOWN'
Keep reading Cinema Period for more updates.

andhadhun-tamil-remake-movie-announcemen.heading: Hindi Superhit Movie 'Andhadhun' Becomes 'Andhagan' in Tamil
andhadhun-tamil-remake-movie-announcemen.author: Balaji
textContent: Hindi movie Andhadhun, starring Ayushman Khuranna, Radhika Apte and Tabu was a super duper hit in 2018. It was universally appreciated and ended up being the one of the highest grossers of the year.

Now actor Prashanth, the 90's heartthrob was missing from the full-on action for quite sometime now. He was last seen in 'Johnny' in 2018. He was also a part for actor Ram Charan's 'Vinaya Vidheya Rama'.Both the movies didn't help a notch in Prashanth's career.
Now, Prashanth is playing the lead role in Andhadhun's Tamil remake, named 'Andhagan'. Now this is a terrific piece of news for all Prashanth's fans, who are eagerly waiting to see him back in form.

The other actors include Karthick and Simran. The music is by Santhosh Narayanan. It is being bankrolled by the actor's father Thiagarajan. The movie is to be directed by Fredrick, who last directed Jothika's 'Pon Magal vandhal'.

Now this is a sensational setting for actor Prashanth to prove himself to today's audience. A solid, proven script, a young and energetic team, along with the right timing. He was a crowd puller and ruled the Tamil cinema during the 90's. Now it is time for him to turn the clock back.

Prior to this announcement, director Jayam Raja was in talks to helm the movie. Due to difference of opinion, he left the project. Let's hope this movie works big time for actor Prashanth. Stay tuned to Cinema Period.

cinema-theatres-100-percent-occupancy-gr.heading: TN Govt Allows 100% Occupancy In Cinema Theatres
cinema-theatres-100-percent-occupancy-gr.author: Balaji
textContent: Several industries were severely affected because of the lockdowns to prevent the spread of Corona virus. One such industry that came to a standstill was the cinema theatres industry.

Nearly 100 Tamil movies are waiting for the right time to get a proper theatrical release. Even though the theatres were permitted to open for the audience with 50% occupancy, the response for the movie goers has been lukewarm. This can be due to few reasons like people are still wary of the virus infection, lack of solid movies that deserve a theatre visits, availability of OTT playforms and web series to view from the cosy sofas, etc.

Now that the virus infection rate has come down further, the movie industry is waiting to use  upcoming Pongal season to bounce back, with few solid releases. The movie industry had requested the TN Govt to allow 100% occupancy at the theatres. The TN Govt has finally conceded and has passed a Government Order for the same.

Following the Government Order, the industry folks have been thanking TN Chief Minister for the same.Director Bharathi Raja has issued a press release thanking the TN Government for hearing out the industry's voice.

Two movies 'Master' and 'Eeswaran' are getting released on Jan 13th and Jan 14h, 2021. Master was supposedly to be released on April 9th, 2020. Interestingly, Eeswaran was planned and completed during the lockdown itself. Both actors 'Vijay' and 'Simbu' are known as crowd pullers and the theatres are being readied to welcome the crowds.

The whistles, claps and celebrations might see the light of the day again after 9 months. Though the virus threat is not completely out of sight, the people are trying to shrug off those factors and hope for the best. Watch this space for more news and reviews.

choreographer-sandy-new-movie-announced.heading: Dance Master Sandy's New Movie Announced
choreographer-sandy-new-movie-announced.author: Balaji
textContent: Dance master Sandy is one of the top choreographers in the Tamil cinema industry. He was also a part of Bigg Boss 3. Now, he is playing the lead role of a new movie titled '#MoonuMuppathiMoonu' (3:33).
The movie is a time based horror comedy and promises to keep us in the edge of our seats. The first look and poster was released by Vijay Sethupathi at 3:33 PM, signifying the title.

This movie is being directed by Nambikkai Chandru, produced by Jeevitha under 'Bamboo Trees Production'. The music is being scored by Harshavardhan Rameshwar. Actor Shruthi Selvam is the lead actress.

This movie is expected to be a comedy entertainment gala movie, as dance master Sandy's light hearted personality and funniness was highlighted to a larger audience, thanks to Bigg Boss. Watch out this space for more updates.

visithiran-movie-teaser-launched.heading: Visithiran Tamil Movie Teaser Launched
visithiran-movie-teaser-launched.author: Balaji
textContent: Malayalam movie Joseph was a sensational hit when it was released in 2018. It was a crime thriller, with the title character being played by actor Joju George. He also won Kerala state award and a special mention at the National awards. This movie was a critical and commercial hit. The core theme of the movie has many similarities to the novel 'Sareerasaasthram'.
Now, it is being made in Tamil as 'Visithiran', with the titular role being reprised by actor RK Suresh. Actors Madhu Shalini, Poorna, Ilavarasu and Bhagavathi Perumal are also a part of this movie.
This movie is being produced by director Bala under his 'B Studios'. The music is by GV Prakash Kumar and the cinematography is handled by Vetri.
Interestingly, the movie is being remade in Kannada as well in which actor Ravichandran is playing the lead character titled 'Ravi Boppana'.
The teaser of this movie was released on twitter by actor Suriya. This movie is expected to be a big break for RK Suresh as an actor, as the character and plot of the movie is very strong and tested.
As from the teaser, the actor gets the aged character's looks right and the movie making all the right waves to make its way to the theatres anytime soon. Watch out this space for more updates.

ranger-movie-shooting-wrapped.heading: Ranger Movie Shooting Wrapped
ranger-movie-shooting-wrapped.author: Balaji
textContent: Actors Sibiraj's and Ramya Nambheesan's 'Ranger' movie team have completed the shooting and have called it wraps. The movie is directed by Dharani Dharan, music by Arrol Correli.

This is the second movie for the lead actors following their 2017 movie 'Sathya'. This movie 'Ranger' is said to be based on real life stories surrounding the controversial killing of tigress 'Avni' by the forest department in Maharastra. 'SaveTheTigers' is the theme of the movie.

The cast includes Madhu Shalini (of Avan Ivan fame), Shayaji Shinde and Kaali Venkat. As the movie name suggests, the majority of shooting has happened in forest regions like Chalakudy, Vagamon, Palakkad and Talakona.

Actor Sibiraj is awaiting the release of his other movie 'Kaavaldaari', a cop thriller, the remake of Kannada movie with a similar name 'Kaavaludaari'. Ramya Nambeesan has a long list of movies in her kitty, including 'Tamilarasan' with actor Vijay Antony, 'Plan Panni Pannanum' with present Bigg Boss contestant Rio Raj, 'Aalambhana' with actor Vaibhav.
The teaser of 'Ranger' and the songs are expected to be released soon. Watch out for Cinema Period for more updates.

kpen-movie-motion-poster-released.heading: 'Kettavanu Per Edutha Nallavanda' Movie Motion Poster Released
kpen-movie-motion-poster-released.author: Balaji
textContent: This post involves names like Mahath Raghavendra, Sakshi Agarwal, Aishwarya Dutta and this is not about Bigg Boss. These three former Bigg Boss contestants are in together for a movie called 'Kettavanu Per Edutha Nallavanda'. The movie's first motion poster was released in Youtube.
The movie is being directed by debutant Praburam. This movie also has Yogi Babu and Motta Rajendran. The music is taken care by Dharan Kumar.

We all know that actors Mahath and Simbu are close, long time friends. From the motion poster, we can know that Mahath plays a character who is a Simbu fan. The movie name is also derived from one of Simbu's popular songs in 'Silambaatam'. The motion poster also reveals each actor's name along with  name of the character in the movie.

The movie is produced by Favince Paul under 'Varnalaya Cine Creations' and is touted to be a light hearted comedy entertainment, hoping for a possible release by summer 2021. Watch this space for more updates.

actor-bharath-next-movie-launched.heading: Actor Bharath's New Movie Titled 'Yaakai Thiri'
actor-bharath-next-movie-launched.author: Balaji
textContent: Actor Bharath was last seen in his Hotstar original 'Time Enna Boss'. Now, he is onto his next Tamil movie launch. The new movie is titled 'Yaakai Thiri'. This movie is directed by Bharath Mohan. He has earlier directed Igloo, which was released in Zee5 and had positive reviews from the audience.
The cast includes Janani Iyer, Sonakshi Singh, Pratap Pothen and Pandiarajan. The music will be scored by Arrol Correli.

The director also spilled a few beans about the movie. The movie is touted to be romantic comedy in the lines of 'Jeans' movie that can be enjoyed by all including the family audience. thie love-triangular movie will be a wholesome entertainer. The movie is going to be shot in Chennai for 28 days starting on 4th Jan, 2021. After that, the shooting will be continued in Kolkata for a week. The movie is to be produced by Meraki Productions.

Actor Bharath announced about the movie on Twitter and Instagram. He is playing an important role in Prabhu Deva's directional 'Radhe'. Along with this, Bharath is having couple of Malayalam movies in his plate. Watch this space for more updates.

doctor-movie-shotting-wrapped.heading: Siva Karthikeyan's Doctor Movie Shooting Wrapped
doctor-movie-shotting-wrapped.author: Balaji
textContent: Actor Siva Karthikeyan's Doctor movie shooting has been completed. The movie is directed by Nelson Dilipkumar, who helmed Kolamaavu Kokila and who is going to direct actor Vijay's next movie as well.
The movie has lead actress Priyanka Arul Mohan debuting in Tamil cinema, with actor Yogi Babu taking care of the comedy department and actor Vinay being the antagonist.
This movie is produced by Siva Karthikeyan's home company 'SK Productions'. The music is by Anirudh and 'Chellama' song from the video has already garnered more than 80 million views in Youtube.

The movie is expected to have a grand audio launch soon and looking for a Summer 2021 release. Apart from this movie, Siva Karthikeyan has 'Ayalaan' movie coming up after Doctor. Watch this space for more updates.

vijay-sethupathi-hindi-debut-movie.heading: Vijay Sethupathi's Hindi Debut Movie Title Announced
vijay-sethupathi-hindi-debut-movie.author: Akash
textContent: Actor Vijay Sethupathi is one actor in Indian Cinema who is constantly juggling different things, so much so that he has a lineup that is unmatched. He is a part of 1 hour web film called 'Mugizh', plays antagonist in Vijay's 'Master', producing movies, acting in extended cameos, making debuts in other languages as well. The ace actor is now making his debut in Hindi Cinema with 'Mumbaikar' movie.
Earlier, he was reported to make his debut with Aamir Khan's Laal Singh Chaddha, but he has opted out from that movie.

This movie is a official remake of Lokash Kanagaraj's 'Maanagaram' movie. It is to be directed and picturized by Santhosh Sivan, with Vikrant Massey as the lead actor. No, what? Vijay Sethupathi is not playing the lead in his debut Hindi movie? Yes, he is known to suprise us. Vikram Massey is reprising the role actually played by actor Sudhip Kishan in Managaram.

So, what is the role for Vijay Sethupathi? It was originally played by actor Munishkaanth. It is a very interesting and heavily comic oriented role, and with Vijay Sethupathi enacting it, he would add his style in it.
The movie's poster was released by the 'Bahubali' director SS Rajamouli and director Karan Johar on Twitter.

The movie is produced by Shibhu Tameens. The music is by Prashant Pillai. The movie cast includes Sanjay Mishra, Sachin Khedekar and Tanay Maniktala. Keep an eye on Cienema Period space for more updates.

kodiyil-oruvan-movie-teaser-released.heading: Vijay Antony's Kodiyil Oruvan Movie Teaser Released
kodiyil-oruvan-movie-teaser-released.author: Akash
textContent: Director Ananda Krishnan who directed the critically acclaimed 'Metro' movie is back with his next release 'Kodiyil Oruvan', starring Vijay Antony and Aathmika. The movie's teaser was released yesterday by actor Karthi on Twitter. The movie is a action-political movie.

The teaser got more than 500K views within hours and was appreciated on social media unanimously. The music is by Nivas Prasanna, known for his works in Thegidi and Sethupathi. The audio rights has been bagged by Saregama.

As per the teaser, we can definitely say that Vijay Antony has come a look way as an actor. An actor who has accepted and worked within his comfort zone, is trying to break from it by getting used as a action hero. The teaser stamps few dance grooves and romatic scenes as well. The actor surely seems to be working on improving his performances to be future-proof in the industry.

Vijay Antony was last seen in Kolaigaran movie that was well received by the audience. The movie is bankrolled by Chendur Film International. It is a first for Vijay Antony-Aathmikha pair also. Apart from this movie, Vijay Antony has a slew of movies in making including Thamezharasan, Agni Siragugal, Khaki and Pichaikaran 2. Watch this space for more updates.

eeswaran-movie-audio-launch.heading: Eeswaran Movie's Audio Launched in Chennai
eeswaran-movie-audio-launch.subHeading: Eeswaran movie's audio launch took place at Albert Theatre, Chennai amidst spledid fanfare and gala.
eeswaran-movie-audio-launch.author: Akash
textContent: Do we remember the kind of cinema movie functions like audio launch, success meet, promotional activities, face-to-face interviews etc? We have gotten virtual as the new normal during the pandemic. After 9 months, a Tamil movie, Eeswaran's audio launch took place in the pre-corona days style at a local theatre. The event was also live streamed on Youtube.

The music is by Thaman. This is third movie for Simbu-Thaman combo, the previous two outings being Osthi and Vaalu. And the entire song recording and adding lyrics has happened virtually via Zoom. This should have been a great and different experience altogether for the team.
Clad in a classic veeti-sattai, actor Simbu and his fans made sure that the event was noisy and fun. With director Suseethiran at helm, the film has been wrapped in around 35 days of shooting.
Actress Niddhi Agarwal is debuting in Tamil Cinema with this movie. Director and actor Bharathiraja plays an important role in this movie. Other actors include Nanditha and Bala Saravanan.

Speaking at the event, director Suseenthiran said he was warned by many of his friends and producers to not go aboard with Simbu for a movie. Director's belief and the actor's dedication for this project has helped the movie to be completed in a record time.

With his belligerent looks and glow, actor Simbu's speech was the obvious highlight of the event. He pins hopes on this movie to bring positivity among the audience, during this torrid time of Corona. Apparently, the producer Mr.Balaji has been finalized just a couple of weeks before the shooting commencement, and rightfully the producer was praised for his confidence in the team. With much spiritualism and sans punch dialogue and self praise, a Simbu's speech was motivational and spoken right from the heart.
Actor Bharathiraja heaped praise on Simbu's discipline and gentle nature. And ofcourse the Tamizhan bonding among them.
The cinematography is by Tirru and editing work by Anthony. The festival Pongal is known for a long leave and elaborate celebrations. With Master and Eeswaran, the audience are in for a grand treat.

With the entire team hoping for a 100% occupancy regulations from the TN government, the order is still pending. Some say that the Government might allow for 75% occupancy, further adding to the confusion and anxiety.
Another movie with Simbu-Suseenthiran project to be released for Diwali 2021 is also in cards. Hopefully, this movie's success must pave way for the movie in talks.
With the Corona cases on the decline, the decision from TN Govt is highly anticipated one. Stay tuned to this space for more updates.

actor-vijay-sethupathi-mughizh-movie-tra.heading: Actor Vijay Sethupathi's New Movie 'Mughizh' Trailer Launched
actor-vijay-sethupathi-mughizh-movie-tra.author: Akash
textContent: Mughizh is a Tamil 'web film' starring Vijay Sethupathi, Regina Cassandra, written & directed by Karthik Swaminathan. This movie is more special for Vijay Sethupathu as the movie is produced by actor Vijay Sethupathi under 'Vijay Sethupathi Productions' banner. Also this movie is the debut movie for Vijay Sethupathi's daughter Shreeja Vijay Sethupathi.
Vijay Sethupathi's son, Surya Vijay Sethupathi, made his movie debut in 'Naanum Rowdy Dhan' movie. He again acted with his father in 'Sindhu Bhaadh' movie.
This movie's dialogue is by Vijay Sethupathi's close friend and director Balaji Tharaneedharan of 'Nadula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom' and 'Seedhakaadhi' fame.
This is Regina Cassandra's first movie with Vijay Sethupathi and we are hoping to have a blast seeing this terrific onscreen duo.

The actor is waiting for his movie 'Master' on Jan 13th 2021, where he is defining himself as antagonist. He also has a queue of movies under his belt including Kadaisi Vivasayi, Tughlaq Darbar, Annabelle Subramaniam, Maamanithan, Laabham, Kaathu Vaakula Rendu Kadhal, Corona Kumar among others. He is one of the busiest actors in the Tamil film industry today.

As 'Mugizh' is a web film instead of a regular movie, the running time is touted to be just around an hour. This is another feather is Vijay Sethupathi for trying different things and juggling so adaptly. Keep watching this space for the film's review upon its release.

priya-bhavani-shankar-new-movie-announce.heading: Actor Priya Bhavani Shankar's New Movie Announcements
priya-bhavani-shankar-new-movie-announce.subHeading: The actress is on a roll, starring in many exciting movies back to back.
priya-bhavani-shankar-new-movie-announce.author: Akash
textContent: December 31st is the birthday of actress Priya Bhavani Shankar. And to conincide with her special day, two of her upcoming movies are announced today.

First one is her movie 'Rudhran' with actor Raghava Lawrence. It has music by G.V Prakash Kumar, who himself is a very busy hero. It is good to know that a actor-music director is still composing music to other movies as well. Raghava Lawrence announced Priya's involvement as lead actress along with their birthday wish in a tweet. It is to be noted that the movie was announced with actor Lawrence's involvement on the actor's birthday on Oct 29th, 2020.

The other team that has followed the same approach is the team of 'Pathu Thala'. This movie stars actors Simbu and Gautham Karthick together in lead roles. Now Priya is doing the lead actress role in this movie as well. This movie is to be directed by the 'Sillunu Oru Kadhal' fame director Krishna.

Priya has a list of completed movies awaiting release. This includes 'Omana Penne', an official remake of Telugu superhit Pelli Chupulu, 'Kuruthi Aatam' with actor Atharva, 'Bommai' with SJ Suryah, 'Kalathil Sandhipom' with actor Jiiva.
She is also a part of 'Indian 2' movie, even as the shooting of the movie is not expected anytime soon. She is also a part of untitled movies with actor Arun Vijay and actor Ashok Selvan.
She is also a part of director Chimbhu Devan's next movie 'Kasadathapara' and actor Dulquer Salman's next movie titled 'Vaan'
With a commanding line-up and promising string of releases, we can easily say priya is Tamil Cinema's 'The IT' girl today. Happy birthday, Priya from Team Cinema period. :)

aayirathil-oruvan-2-announcement.heading: Director Selvaraghavan's Next Movie Announced
aayirathil-oruvan-2-announcement.subHeading: Director Selvaraghavan joins hands with his brother and actor Dhanush for his next movie, touted as Aayirathil Oruvan-2.
aayirathil-oruvan-2-announcement.author: Akash
textContent: Director Selvaraghavan's Aayirathil Oruvan might have had an average response from the audience at the time of its theatrical release. But since then, the movie has become a cult. Perhaps few great movies will be celebrated only after its release it seems.

With the technology not so advanced as it is today, the way the director had handled the movie's plot and action adventures are relished by folks, especially the younger crowd. The audience were asking for a sequel for a long time now.

Director Selvaraghavan has had a rough last 2 directional outings with Irandam Ulagam and NGK. Now the director has announced in Twitter that his next is going to be a magnum opus in the form of Aayirathil Oruvan 2.
As expected, the audience have erupted in joy and are seem trending the news on social media. Interestingly, actor Karthi isn't doing the lead role, as he donned in the first part.

Producer Thanu is producing this epic movie and another great news is that the music is by none other than Yuvan Shankar Raja. Selvaraghavan-Dhanush-Yuvan is one of the most memorable combinations in Tamil film industry. The fans are in a treat. But the fans may have to wait a very long time for this as actor Dhanush has pointed out in a tweet that the pre-production work alone needs an year and the movie will be released in year 2024 only.

Another highlight is that without proper releases and movies to watch in theatres, Selvaraghavan's 2 movies - Aayirathil oruvan and Pudhupettai has been re-released in select theatres and cinema fans are re-living their experiences by watching the celebrated movies
Hopefully, AO2 can be another one such repeatable classic movie by the brothers-duo. The fans can wait for tidbits and updates in CinemaPeriod till then :)

pulikkuthi-pandi-first-look-released.heading: Pulikkuthi Pandi Movie's First Look Released
pulikkuthi-pandi-first-look-released.subHeading: Pulikkuthi Pandi, directed by director Muthaiya is actor Vikram Prabhu's next release, produced by Sun Pictures.
pulikkuthi-pandi-first-look-released.author: Akash
textContent: Actor Vikram Prabhu's last outing was Asura Guru movie. Now his next release, Pulikkuthi Pandi's first look poster has been released around the new year's day of 2021.

This movie marks another important comeback from actress Lashmi Menon. She has been missing on theatre screens for quite sometime now and her fans and movie folks have been missing her onscreen presence. She is re-uniting with actor Vikram Prabhu, after thier sensational first innings in Kumki movie.

This movie is to be directly released in Sun TV on Jan 14th, 2021, marking the Pongal 2021 release. This is one of the first direct to TV releases in Tamil cinema. This movie will be available in Sun Nxt OTT, also associated with Sun Pictures

As the rugged look of Vikram Prabhu in first look suggests, this movie seems to be a village entertainer and the expectations are running high for a direct to TV release. As Sun TV is in charge of the movie, they will be rising their promotions as well.
This movie keeps us safe, excited and hopefully happy by turning out to be an excellent festival movie release.

coolie-no-1.heading: Coolie No. 1 - This Movie Makes Us Work Hard To Complete The Movie
coolie-no-1.subHeading: This movie makes us forget that the year is 2020 and the movie goers' brains has stopped growing since 1995.
coolie-no-1.author: Akash
textContent: The existential coolie in me is happy because I now carry the burden of my past. The innocent Gujarati child in 1995 – who forced his mother to make spicy bhel puri after his cravings were triggered by Govinda and Karishma Kapoor finding amorous metaphors in Mumbai street-food – had absolutely no idea that 25 years later he’d be waking up on Christmas morning of the darkest year in modern history to review Coolie No. 1, lose his appetite and wonder how Santa Claus eats sev-puri without soiling that glorious beard. This is the cruellest form of time-travel: Everything has changed and nothing has changed. While it’s mighty philanthropic of director David Dhawan to make us forget that the year is 2020, it’s also misanthropic to make us forget that the human mind has evolved in the last 25 years. Between Judwaa 2 and this one, it’s hard to imagine a less productive way of making movies.

After being insulted by a rich businessman named Rosario, Pandit Jai Kishen teaches him a lesson by getting his daughter married to Raju - a Coolie posing as a millionaire. Soon Raju’s real indentity is exposed but he cooks up a story of having a filthy rich twin. One lie leads to another and things start to go out of hand.

After being insulted by a rich businessman, pandit Jai Kishen teaches him a lesson by getting his daughter married to Raju, a coolie posing as a millionaire. Coolie No.1 Full Comedy Sara Ali Khan ka acting Baught hi MST hai Varun Dhawan ka bhi acting Baught hi accha first time Coolie bana hai Varun Dhawan Song r good

This movie gotta be a hit..I AM NOT AGAINST or with NEPOTISM..We must support SSR but that doesnt mean u have to boycott others...If u dont wanna watch the movie dont..why spreading the hate..Varun has nothing to do with Nepo.Varun was a friend of SSR..And SSR would nevr want something like this..that because of him and Nepo.many actors lost their career...And for the ones who says varun is overacting or words like that..Are you even enough?..U wanna judge VD's acting..first go watch October and Badlapur.even aftr watching these movie,u complain his acting..u should go to docter and have a chek up.... We want justice for SSR but not by boycotting Alia,Varun,Sara  etc.I have been waiting for this movie for like nearly 2yr..This movie is gonna be a hit...most people r gonna avoid a hard work of VD and many more just because he is a star kid..what happnd if he is a star kid..he came up with his own hard work..There r billions of fan not just in FB Insta and twittr there r many more Varuniacs..And I am sure Varuniacs will support VD no mattr what othrs think..Varun is really humble and very kind and fun person..he really behavs humbly towards the fans.as many actors behave not politeley to the fans..I am 100%sure Varuniacs are not just fan of his movies dancing etc. His personality really is very good and He is very HARD WORKING..He is one of the most hard working Actors I have evr known..

simbu-eeswaran-movie-release-update.heading: Eeswaran Movie Release Update
simbu-eeswaran-movie-release-update.subHeading: Actor Simbu's Eeswaran movie has completed shooting in record time. Since Simbu is looking to turn around his career, the expectations among his fans is also soaring high.
simbu-eeswaran-movie-release-update.author: Akash
textContent: Simbu's Eeswaran movie is scheduled to release on Pongal 2021. After completing the shooting in record time (less than 30 days), Simbu has been mightily impressed by the movie's director Suseenthiran's working style and skills. So much so that he is in talks to do another movie with the same director

This is one of the rare instances where a Simbu movie has been completed without any problems. Simbu has been the target of many people, both in the industry and from the general people, due to his conflicting behaviour on the sets and his constant attitude and delays in completing the promised movies.

As for everybody, it was indeed Simbu's downtime. Now, he is soaring back. With his chisiled looks back, he is more involved in honouring his commitments. His support in completing his Eeswaran and Maanadu has been quite impressive, even for established industry folks. Along with actor Vijay's Master, Eeswaran is expected to release for this Pongal. One might say, it is a long overdue for Simbu's fans.

master-release-pongal-2020.heading: Master - Post Pandemic Saviour For The Theatres
master-release-pongal-2020.subHeading: Master, directed by Lokesh Kanagraj was set to release on April 9th, 2020. But the unforeseen pandemic situation has delayed, pushing the movie release to Jan 13th, 2021
master-release-pongal-2020.author: Akash
textContent: The cinema industry was leaning on OTT releases and OTT original productions. Now that theatres are opening up with 50% occupancy, the movies goers are not flocking to the theatres. Obviously the scare is still out there, with vaccination line that might be several months away from us, the movie industry is waiting to ride on Master's release to bring back the crowd and festivities to the theatres.

It was reported that actor Vijay spoke to the Tamil Nadu's Chief Minister Edapadi Palanisami to increase the theatre occupancy rate per show. Now the second wave is on the go, we can only spectate what could be the right move regarding the theatre ocupancy.

The movie is expected to clash with actor Simbu's Easwaran movie for the Pongal, 2020. As both actor Vijay and actor Simbu are known for their mass appeal, the theatre owners are waiting for the release eagerly to set their cash registers ringing.

Master's trailer is waiting to be launched anytime around the new year's day. The social media is waiting to be erupted by the fanfare. With fanfare, the rivalry can't be too far back. The bickering among fans is a norm in today's world, no matter what.
Master is waiting to be released big in mutiple langauges at once on Jan 13th. It is kind of a pan-India movie now. The theatres count in each state is said to be huge.
Whatever the excitement may be, please stay safe. The world needs to be self-precautionary.

pisasu-2-first-look-released.heading: Pisasu 2 First Look Poster Released
pisasu-2-first-look-released.subHeading: Pisasu, directed by director Myskin, is having a sequel - Pisasu 2. Pisasu 2 is starring actor Andrea Jeremiah, directed again by Myskin. The first look poster of the movie has been released.
pisasu-2-first-look-released.author: Akash
textContent: The first look poster has been doing rounds in the social media platforms. Andrea resembles an Anglo Indian woman. And the cherry on the cake was that it was Andrea's birthday on which the first look was released and dedicated to.

She has also revealed that her first look is based on her maternal grandmother's old photograph. Also, it seems that it was Andrea's initiative to base her look for the movie from her grandmother's photograph.
It is to be noted that Andrea is playing a role in the upcoming 'Master' movie.

bhoomi-ott-release-pongal-2020.heading: Bhoomi Goes The OTT Way - To Be Released in Disney-Hotstar
bhoomi-ott-release-pongal-2020.subHeading: Bhoomi is releasing for this Pongal, 2021. But just not in theatres. Even as theatres in TN are opening up, Bhoomi's OTT release comes as a suprise.
bhoomi-ott-release-pongal-2020.author: Akash
textContent: Bhoomi movie was supposed to be released on May 1st, 2020. But the pandemic has delayed it to Jan 13th, 2021. And it is not seeing a theatrical release. It is releasing in Disney-Hotstar.
Bhoomi is directed by director Laskshman, starring Jayam Ravi and music by D Imman. This is the third movie for the trio, following Romeo Juliet and Bogan.
The lead actress of the movie is Nidhi Agarwal. It is going to be an unique Sankaranthi for her as her another movie with actor Simbu, Easwaran is releasing for Pongal 2021, but in theatres.
The songs of the movie has made it big on YouTube. Catch you people with Bhoomi's movie review.
